page.title: 20The Domesday Survey
page.content: The children and teachers of St Thomas' R.C.Primary School have produced this work.We spoke to many people asking such questions as:- 1) How long have you lived here? 2) How old is your house? 3) Where do you shop? 4) What do you like or dislike about the area? We visited shops and farms. We interviewed local dignitaries, and we toured the area to find the land cover and amenities such as schools,garden centres and 'bus routes. Using this information we have worked in groups to produce articles which we hope represent the character and give a picture of the village.
